title: E198 Carl Lentz Explains Jesus - IMPAULSIVE EP. 198
itunes:title: Carl Lentz Explains Jesus - IMPAULSIVE EP. 198
description:
In this faith-based episode, Carl Lentz (American Pastor and co-founder of Hillsong Church) explains his non-denominational faith, why celebrities like Justin Bieber attend his Church, the conversation he has with God, simulation theory and the rising tide of Atheism.
